reviews.text: Almost all variants of smartphones are available here in centre of city... Staff is good and the Owner of the shop is too good.. very polite towards their customers..

I had come here to have the screen repaired of my Galaxy J6 plus device. The service was really quick (around 20-30 minutes) and the job was very well done. Best part was the repair was done immediately and i didn't have to wait till the next day. (I came here in the evening, around 8pm)

Highly recommended for anyone looking for trusted mobile accessories and top-notch customer service. Truly the best in town!

reviews.text:
I would rate this store as 5 star just because it's a mi store here you will find all the mi product at the original price as on the online mi store. I loved the service i went there to buy note 10 pro. And loved it
I just request the owner to add there no over the map .

With utmost patience they handled all my queries...they know customer service I must say ( atleast more than sales people from so many other stores in Indore🙄😕) as they listened each and every thing that I was looking for in a led tv...they understood and suggested the exact tv i was looking for...I bought one for myself and m Happy!!!!
Well, i definitely recommend this mi Store,as it has wide range of latest products....

i went there twice but the price on the online mi store nd offline store was different then i get to know this is not an official mi store anymore it used to but not now i don't know what these guys are doing they are spoiling mi reputation i hope Xiaomi will take strict action against them lastly i had a bad experience there i won't recommend anyone to go there if you wanna buy something online store are still better then this one...#peace🤘
